metadata.name: Serie A Match Ticket
metadata.description:
Come enjoy some of the best games/players the Serie A football league has to offer! Each reward is eligible for 2 tickets to predetermined matches. Match and Game Selection will be first-come, first-served when claims open and can be claimed on [ccfc.coolcatsnft.com](https://ccfc.coolcatsnft.com).

Tickets will be delivered digitally after claiming and users must provide data such as email address to be eligible to claim.
